A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The film moved slow at several points. 

There were a couple scenes where I rolled my eyes and muttered to myself\, "This ain't Star Wars." Also\, there was a scene where I thought of "Return of the Jedi\," and muttered\, "Are we doing this again? Really?" 

The fight scenes and space battles were good.  But overall\, "The Last Jedi" is a C movie that gets a B-minus at absolute best if we're grading on a curve.
